subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sandra Gal made six straight birdies to take the first-round lead in the Meijer L.P.G.A. Classic in Belmont, Mich., while Michelle Wie withdrew with a wrist injury.
snippet: Sandra Gal made six straight birdies to take the first-round lead in the Meijer L.P.G.A. Classic in Belmont, Mich., while Michelle Wie withdrew with a wrist injury.
